get.description: Retrieve a collection of 'ResourceProperties' with all or some selected properties in the given order by specifying the given filter condition.

patch.description: Update an instance of 'ResourceProperties' with the given payload of type 'ResourceProperty' in JSON format and with the specified id.

get.description: Retrieve all or some selected properties from an instance of 'ResourceProperties' with the given id.
